name: GPConnect-CareRecord-Operation-1
description: Request to retrieve the Patient's Care Record

parameter.name: patientNHSNumber
parameter.documentation: Patient that matches the NHS Number

parameter.name: recordSection
parameter.documentation: Section of the care record defined by the parameter

parameter.name: timePeriod
parameter.documentation: The time period for the requested information

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: View of the Patient's care record. This will be a view of a specified section of the care record.
